category.name: Programming Skills Development
category.description: A collection of activities for programmers to improve their skills and knowledge at their own pace, focusing on a wide range of areas within the tech industry.

tasks.name: Algorithm and Data Structure Review
tasks.desc: Review and understand various algorithms and data structures, such as sorting, searching, trees, and graphs, to strengthen your foundation in computer science.

tasks.name: Learn a New Programming Language
tasks.desc: Expand your programming skills by learning a new language, such as Rust, Kotlin, or Swift, to diversify your skillset and increase your adaptability.

tasks.name: Master a Framework or Library
tasks.desc: Choose a popular framework or library like React, Angular, Django, or TensorFlow, and dive deep into its features and best practices to expand your expertise.

tasks.name: Contribute to Open Source
tasks.desc: Identify open-source projects that align with your interests and contribute by submitting patches, reporting bugs, or helping with documentation to gain real-world experience.

tasks.name: Develop a Personal Project
tasks.desc: Initiate a personal project that demonstrates your creativity, problem-solving abilities, and passion for programming, which can serve as a showcase during job interviews.

tasks.name: Acquire a New Technical Skill
tasks.desc: Learn a new technical skill, such as version control with Git, containerization with Docker, or continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) to improve your overall competency.

tasks.name: Read Technical Books and Blogs
tasks.desc: Stay up-to-date with industry trends and deepen your knowledge by reading programming books, articles, and blogs from established developers and thought leaders.
